title: Mastery level 7

embed.description: Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

body: So yesterday i got mastery level 7 on nocturne while being in the new client, the thing is the alert will pop up even tho i already made him level 7 every time i close and open the client , just a minor bug i wanted to post {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Hey TheDeâthMaker,

Thanks for the post.  I believe we'll see a fix on Live for this during the next patch.  Please let us know if you see this after 6.22.  :fistbump:
It does this with key fragments and chests I think as well, they said it should be fixed in the next patch.
